items.sentence: How can I get in touch with you, Dad, after you are gone?
Tom looked straight past Mary like she didn't even exist.
Tom and Mary talked about their school and their friends.
You don't look very well. You shouldn't go to work today.
The problem with this product is that nobody will buy it.
The things on my porch are all things I'm trying to sell.
We were just so happy that Tom finally got his dream job.
The real reason I asked you to stay is we need your help.
That movie was more interesting than I expected it to be.
If it should rain tomorrow, the game would be called off.
